Name: Lens
ShortDescription: Lens Protocol is a composable and decentralized social graph, ready for you to build on so you can focus on creating a great experience, not scaling your users.

Name: Multichain
ShortDescription: No-slippage Bridge. Multichain's 1:1 bridge enables users to perform 0 slippage transfers and eliminate the hidden cost associated with AMM.

Name: Orbiter
ShortDescription: Orbitor Finance is a decentralized cross-rollup Layer 2 bridge with a contract only on the destination side.

Name: iZUMi Finance
ShortDescription: Liquidity Redefined - A multi-chain DeFi protocol providing One-Stop Liquidity as a Service (LaaS).

Name: EthSign
ShortDescription: EthSign is building the interface between Web2 and Web3 by connecting legal agreement and smart contract.

Name: SynFuture
ShortDescription: Decentralized Futures Trading Platform

Name: Connext
ShortDescription: Connext is a modular interoperability protocol that lets you build secure crosschain apps (xApps)

Name: Synapse
ShortDescription:
Synapse is the most widely used, extensible, secure cross-
chain communications network. Build truly cross-chain
applications using the Synapse Protocol.

Name: zCloak
ShortDescription: zCloak Network is a privacy-first DID and verifiable computation infrastructure. It aims to deliver the Web3 dream of Self-Sovereignty by moving both the storage and the computation of user data into user device from centralized servers.

Name: Covalent
ShortDescription: Covalent provides the industry-leading Unified API bringing visibility to billions of Web3 data points. Developers use Covalent to build exciting multi-chain applications using data from 26+ blockchains.

Name: Keystone
ShortDescription: Keystone is a 100% air-gapped QR code hardware wallet. The wallet is designed to maximize attack cost, minimize trust, prevent potential human error, avoid single-point-of-failures and boost interoperability with maximized compatibility to most of top software wallets.

Name: BlockWallet
ShortDescription: BlockWallet is the most private non-custodial Web3 wallet. Users can enjoy MEV and IP protection, as well as zk-SNARKs smart contracts which allow for anonymous deposits and withdrawals.

Name: MUX
ShortDescription: Trade crypto with zero price impact, up to 100x leverage and aggregated liquidity. MUX protocol takes care of all the hassles so that you can experience optimized DEX trading on our platform.

Name: Atem
ShortDescription: Atem Network is building a decentralized content creation protocol, we aim at helping creators tokenize their content and build web3 native communities. On top of the protocol, Atem has built two products, a web3 content sharing platform AtemReview and web3 community social platform AtemChat, and reached over 50,000+ users. The team is formed across global top tier universities and companies, including Tsinghua University, CUHK, CMU, JP Morgan, HSBC, Meta, TikTok, Bybit and etc. Atem Network just got $3M funded by GSR Ventures, Mirana Ventures, Mask Network, Foresight Ventures,A&T Capital, INCE Capital, Zonff Partners, Atlas Capital, Co-founder of Zhihu and etc.

Name: DoraHacks
ShortDescription: DoraHacks is the hacker movement and one of the largest Web3 developer incentive platforms. DoraHacks provides key infrastructures connecting developers with grants and other crucial resources from leading Web3 ecosystems. In 2021, DoraHacks helped 3000+ starups raised $30M in grants.

Name: Gnosis Safe
ShortDescription: Gnosis Safe is the safety standard of Web3 and the most trusted platform to manage digital assets for individuals and communities.

Name: BlockPI
ShortDescription: BlockPI Network is a distributed multi-chain acceleration layer, engaging in an accessible and decentralized Web3 environment. The BlockPI provides efficient, reliable and high performance globally distributed API service for Web3 builders.

Name: Redstone
ShortDescription: RedStone is a data ecosystem that delivers frequently updated, reliable and diverse data for your dApp and smart contracts.

Name: Questbook
ShortDescription: Questbook is a place to attract high quality builders and grow your ecosystem. More than 20 ecosystems such as Polygon, Celo, Ton, Aave, and Compund use Questbook to run and manage their grants program and have disbursed ~1.5M in grants to builders.

Name: Soul Wallet
ShortDescription: Soul Wallet uses the ERC-4337 standard to enable users to create, use, and perform social recovery for smart contract wallets through plug-in extensions and mobile applications.

Name: Open Block
ShortDescription: OpenBlock provides a 2C wallet solution by utilizing MPC protocol and a super-app design principle that is more secure, accessible, and powerful.

Name: Transpose
ShortDescription: Explore and integrate real time blockchain data into any application at scale

Name: Unifra
ShortDescription: Unifra provides open, reliable infrastructure service for all web3 developers
